page.title: 17LEISURE IN MATHERN.
page.content:
We questioned the people in our area about their leisure and recreational activities.
Over 80% of the people surveyed regularly visited{leisure centres}in this area: Chepstow, a publicly owned leisure centre, was the most popular with 68% of the survey using it for swimming. St.Pierre, a privately owned site, was the next most popular, mainly for golf but also for swimming and badminton.
Only 6% of the whole survey attended any sort of{adult education}class, but 66% said that they spent at least 2 hours a week on a hobby. The{hobbies ranged from knitting and gardening to campanology, antique restoration and gymnastic coaching.
